articles.author: KEN MORITSUGU
articles.title: China tells NATO not to create chaos in Asia and rejects label of 'enabler' of Russia's Ukraine war - The Associated Press
articles.description: China has accused NATO of seeking security at the expense of others and told the alliance not to bring the same “chaos” to Asia. The statement from a Foreign Ministry spokesperson on Thursday came a day after NATO labeled China a “decisive enabler” of Russia’…
articles.content: BEIJING (AP) China accused NATO on Thursday of seeking security at the expense of others and told the alliance not to bring the same chaos to Asia, a reflection of its determination to oppose strengt… [+3278 chars]
